briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy of SCT200 in Patients With Relapsed or Metastatic Triple Receptor Negative Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Recombinant Anti-EGFR Monoclonal Antibody（SCT200） in Patients With Relapsed or Metastatic Triple Receptor Negative Breast Cancer : a Phase Ⅱ, Open-label, Single-arm, Multicenter Study
